detail_desc: Shirt in a cool pima cotton weave with a pointed collar, patterned yoke and classic front. Wide pleat at the back to create volume. Long sleeves with an opening at the cuffs, and wide cuffs with adjustable buttons. Rounded hem.
Wide jumper in sturdy, rib-knit wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, rounded sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Close fitting at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a polo neck, twisted side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a polo neck, twisted side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a rib-knit V-neck, rounded shoulders and dolman sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit that tapers to the hem.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit wool with a V-neck, large, tone-on-tone buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide elasticated knit trim at the cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Leggings in soft, rib-knit merino wool with a high elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated knit trims at the hems.
Fitted top in soft wool jersey.
Fitted top in soft wool jersey.
Fitted top in airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend. Round neck with narrow ribbing and extra-long sleeves.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy wool jersey containing some cashmere with extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy wool jersey containing some cashmere with extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy wool jersey containing some cashmere with extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Dresses in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a lace-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Pin-tucks with lace trims at the front, an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring under the bust, and a gently draping, flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a lace-trimmed stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Pin-tucks with lace trims at the front, an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring under the bust, and a gently draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.
Non-wired bikini top with a tie detail at the front and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Non-wired bikini top with a tie detail at the front and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft cotton. Sleeveless, A-line top in woven fabric with a flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders, and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist. Hairband in jersey with a decorative bow at the front and elastication at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in sturdy, rib-knit organic cotton. Jumper with raglan sleeves, buttons on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with a drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in fine-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves and buttons down the front that continue down one leg. Roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a linen blend with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a linen blend with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a linen blend with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.

T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut lace dress with a V-neck front and back. Lined with a jersey underdress.
Straight-cut lace dress with a V-neck front and back. Lined with a jersey underdress.
Shirt jacket in sturdy, checked cotton twill with a collar and zip down the front. Flap chest pocket with a button, welt side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined.
Shirts woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Dress in a softly draping viscose crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Set with a skirt and top in cotton. Skirt in a textured knit with frill-trimmed straps. Top in patterned jersey with long sleeves.
Cycling shorts in jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.

Pull-on trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in softly draping denim with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a pendant and one with plastic beads. Adjustable length, 42-49 cm.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, smocking at the shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, frill-trimmed elasticated seam under the bust with ties. Lined at the top of the front.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping, patterned satin with a regular waist, wrapover front, concealed zip at the back and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy weave. High waist with elasticated smocking, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a textured cotton weave with a high waist with wide elastication and a raw-edge frill trim at the top. Lined.
Shorts in an airy, crinkled nylon blend. High waist with wide smocking and a small frill trim, side pockets and wide legs.
Shorts in an airy, crinkled nylon blend. High waist with wide smocking and a small frill trim, side pockets and wide legs.
Calf-length, batik-patterned skirt in Tencel™ lyocell with ties at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
